snippet: A congressional panel accused Susan Hedman of not responding forcefully enough when she learned the city was not adding an anti-corrosion chemical to the water supply.
abstract: House oversight committee members score former Environmental Protection Agency official Susan Hedman for her inadequate response to discovery that city of Flint, Mich, was not taking action it was told would prevent lead from leaching into city's drinking water.
